name: Liability Per Risk level Report
query:
SELECT
    risk_level AS "Risk Level::150",
    SUM(potential_liability) AS "Total Liability:Currency:180",
    COUNT(name) AS "Number of Cases::120"
FROM
    `tabLegal Case`
WHERE
    potential_liability IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY
    risk_level
ORDER BY
    FIELD(risk_level, 'High', 'Medium', 'Low');
